mint
mint
burn

@notice ERC721 interface compatible function for position token name retrieving
 @return Returns name of token

approve(address,uint256).details: Approves another address to transfer the given token ID The zero address indicates there is no approved address. There can only be one approved address per token at a given time. Can only be called by the token owner or an approved operator.

params._to: address to be approved for the given token ID
params._tokenId: uint256 ID of the token to be approved

balanceOf(address).details: Gets the number of tokens owned by the address we are checking
balanceOf(address).return: balance The unique amount of tokens owned

balanceOf(address,uint256).return: Amount of objects of a given type ID

params._quantity: uint256 Quantity of positions to burn
params._tokenId: uint256 tokenId of positions to burn

exists(uint256).details: Returns whether the specified token exists

params._tokenId: uint256 ID of the token to query the existence of

getApproved(uint256).details: Gets the approved address for a token ID, or zero if no address set

params._tokenId: uint256 ID of the token to query the approval of

getApproved(uint256).return: address currently approved for the given token ID

getApproved(uint256,address).details: Gets the approved address for a token ID, or zero if no address set

params._tokenId: uint256 ID of the token to query the approval of

getApproved(uint256,address).return: address currently approved for the given token ID

getRegistry().return: address Address of registry set in current contract

isApprovedForAll(address,address).details: Function that verifies whether _operator is an authorized operator of _tokenHolder.

params._operator: The address of the operator to query status of

isApprovedForAll(address,address).return: A uint256 specifying the amount of tokens still available for the spender.

isApprovedOrOwner(address,address,uint25.return: Returns whether _spender is approved to spend tokens

params._buyer: address Address of LONG position receiver
params._derivativeHash: bytes32 Hash of derivative (ticker) of position
params._quantity: uint256 Quantity of positions to mint
params._seller: address Address of SHORT position receiver

params._buyer: address Address of LONG position receiver
params._derivativeHash: bytes32 Hash of derivative (ticker) of position
params._quantity: uint256 Quantity of positions to mint

ownerOf(uint256).details: Gets the owner of a given NFT

params._tokenId: uint256 representing the unique token identifier

ownerOf(uint256).return: address the owner of the token

safeBatchTransferFrom(address,address,ui.details: transfer objects from different tokenIds to specified address

params._amounts: Array of amount of object per type to be transferred.
params._data: Data to pass to onERC721OReceived() function if recipient is contract Note:  Arrays should be sorted so that all tokenIds in a same bin are adjacent (more efficient).
params._from: The address to BatchTransfer objects from.
params._to: The address to batchTransfer objects to.
params._tokenIds: Array of tokenIds to update balance of

setApprovalForAll(address,bool).details: Will set _operator operator status to true or false

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: See {IERC165-supportsInterface}.     * Time complexity O(1), guaranteed to always use less than 30 000 gas.

tokenByIndex(uint256).details: Gets the token ID at a given index of all the tokens in this contract Reverts if the index is greater or equal to the total number of tokens

params._index: uint256 representing the index to be accessed of the tokens list

tokenByIndex(uint256).return: uint256 token ID at the given index of the tokens list

tokensOwned(address).details: Gets Iterate through the list of existing tokens and return the indexes       and balances of the tokens owner by the user
tokensOwned(address).return: indexes The tokenIdsbalances The balances of each token

totalSupply().details: Gets the total amount of tokens stored by the contract
totalSupply().return: uint256 representing the total amount of tokens

devdoc.title: Opium.TokenMinter contract implements ERC721O token standard for minting, burning and transferring position tokens

isApprovedOrOwner(address,address,uint25.notice: VIEW FUNCTIONSChecks whether _spender is approved to spend tokens on _owners behalf or owner itself

mint(address,address,bytes32,uint256).notice: Mints LONG and SHORT position tokens

mint(address,bytes32,uint256).notice: Mints only LONG position tokens for "pooled" derivatives

name().notice: ERC721 interface compatible function for position token name retrieving

symbol().notice: ERC721 interface compatible function for position token symbol retrieving
